Layer.GlobalClockMessageCommand: %function(self) if not GlobalClock then GlobalClock = self; self:effectperiod(1000000) end end
Layer.MessageSoundMessageCommand: %function(self) if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen() ~= nil and SOUND ~= nil then if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetName() ~= 'ScreenCenterImage' then local Path = THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, 'gnSystemMessage', 'sound' ); SOUND:PlayOnce(Path); end end end
